channel.title: Questions
channel.description:
Ok so im using a soucre called Kilop-scape by uncalled and im very new so could somebody help me with simple questions like for starters
the bank says "Bank of Kilop-scape" and i would like it to say "Bank of RisenChaos" how owuld i do this?

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

JavaScript is remotely easy, I’ve never been a fan of C++.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:9, topic:381732”][quote author=Scaar link=topic=477543.msg3494026#msg3494026 date=1297145524]

[quote author=Uncalled link=topic=477543.msg3494024#msg3494024 date=1297145326]

[quote author=Scaar link=topic=477543.msg3494023#msg3494023 date=1297145232]

Search “Kilop-scape” in the client folder and all the files with the word “kilop-scape” will come up. Then click on the files and do “ctrl-f” and search “Kilop-scape” and change all of them to RisenChaos.
[/quote]It’s also in TextHandler.java, seeing how Kilop-Scape is a DeltaScape server.

HA! ok didnt think of that. thanks alot uncalled and neon.

also on a side note. I love you Uncalled cause you have specific customs in the server that i was going to add and they’re already there and in the correct equipment spot XD<3
[/quote]Thanks, and of course I’d have the proper equipment slots :).

You would be surprised about the number of items in alot of servers that people neglect.

Like the death cape for example yours is perfect, yet on Luckscape its a god damn weapon XD
[/quote]Well perfecting slotting is very basic, you’d be surprised how easy it is, if you need any help with the source feel free to pm me![/quote]

Hell yea ill pm you lol im very new and this is helpful. i wanna learn javascripting before i attempt c++ again for counterstrike >_<

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Scaar, post:8, topic:381732”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=477543.msg3494024#msg3494024 date=1297145326]

[quote author=Scaar link=topic=477543.msg3494023#msg3494023 date=1297145232]

Search “Kilop-scape” in the client folder and all the files with the word “kilop-scape” will come up. Then click on the files and do “ctrl-f” and search “Kilop-scape” and change all of them to RisenChaos.
[/quote]It’s also in TextHandler.java, seeing how Kilop-Scape is a DeltaScape server.

HA! ok didnt think of that. thanks alot uncalled and neon.

also on a side note. I love you Uncalled cause you have specific customs in the server that i was going to add and they’re already there and in the correct equipment spot XD<3
[/quote]Thanks, and of course I’d have the proper equipment slots :).

You would be surprised about the number of items in alot of servers that people neglect.

Like the death cape for example yours is perfect, yet on Luckscape its a god damn weapon XD[/quote]Well perfecting slotting is very basic, you’d be surprised how easy it is, if you need any help with the source feel free to pm me!

Read full topic

[/quote]It’s also in TextHandler.java, seeing how Kilop-Scape is a DeltaScape server.

HA! ok didnt think of that. thanks alot uncalled and neon.

also on a side note. I love you Uncalled cause you have specific customs in the server that i was going to add and they’re already there and in the correct equipment spot XD<3
[/quote]Thanks, and of course I’d have the proper equipment slots :).[/quote]

You would be surprised about the number of items in alot of servers that people neglect.

Like the death cape for example yours is perfect, yet on Luckscape its a god damn weapon XD

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Neon_Fortune Neon Fortune
item.description:
@Neon_Fortune wrote:

Nah man I’m pretty sure the bank is client sided or at least it was for my source. So go into the Client files not the Source files.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

Neon Fortune:

Search “Kilop-scape” in the client folder and all the files with the word “kilop-scape” will come up. Then click on the files and do “ctrl-f” and search “Kilop-scape” and change all of them to RisenChaos.

Ive done that, idk if it being delta based means anything or not but Ive edited the client.java and the server.java and it still says “bank of kilopscape”

if i misunnderstood you then could you please re-word it? thank you

Read full topic
